description: Try our easy to follow Fish & Asparagus Mornay recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Fish & Asparagus Mornay Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 750g nile perch fillets, cut into pieces
2 bunch asparagus, trimmed, cut into thirds

recipeInstructions.text: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add flour and stir until well combined. Cook for 1 minute or until bubbly.
Remove mornay sauce from heat and slowly whisk in milk. Return to heat and stir constantly until mixture comes to the boil and thickens.
Stir in 1/4 cup cheese. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 2 minutes. Remove from heat. Place asparagus into a bowl and cover with boiling water. Stand for 2 minutes. Drain.
Lay fish into a large shallow ceramic dish. Top with asparagus. Pour over sauce. Combine remaining cheese and breadcrumbs in a small bowl.
Sprinkle over mornay and bake for 15 minutes or until topping is golden. Serve immediately.
